overview_summary: There are five adjacent landowners, but only one is an individual resident; the remaining four are corporate or government property owners. The resident neighbor has been openly supportive of development, and none of the other owners have a publicly stated stance. Community influence is centered on the lone resident neighbor (a neighborhood activist), whereas the institutional owners have unclear local influence.

neighbors.name: James Szwedo
neighbors.claims: James Szwedo is a well-known Niagara Falls community activist and businessman who has led the Niagara Street Neighborhood Revitalization Organization for over 20 years [The Niagara Reporter — news, retrieved 2025-11-07; "a well known community activist and businessman"](https://niagarafallsreporter.com/business-leader-jim-szwedo-calls-for-participation-for-mondays-city-hall-public-hearing-on-mayors-land-grab-for-event-center/) [Niagara Digital Campus — company, retrieved 2025-11-07; "For the past 20 years, I have been president of the nonprofit Niagara Street Neighborhood Revitalization Organization"](https://niagaradigitalcampus.com/news/szwedo-we-can-have-all-three-instead-of-just-one/). He has publicly opposed the city’s attempt to use eminent domain for a new events center, instead advocating for a privately funded $1.5 billion high-tech data center project on the same land [Frank Report — news, retrieved 2025-11-07; "eminent domain ... sell 10 acres ... $1.5 billion high tech data center ... events center on the same land"](https://frankreport.com/2023/03/13/niagara-falls-residents-push-back-against-mayors-plan-to-divert-funds-for-land-seizure/). He has described himself as a "lifelong resident of Niagara Falls" who has seen the city "squander and toss aside every significant chance it had for development and change" [Niagara Digital Campus — company, retrieved 2025-11-07; "lifelong resident of Niagara Falls ... squander and toss aside every significant chance it had for development and change"](https://niagaradigitalcampus.com/news/szwedo-we-can-have-all-three-instead-of-just-one/).

approach_recommendations.engage: Engage through his neighborhood revitalization group, emphasizing community input and the project's tax benefits.
